5.name: Sol
5.text:
"Ooooo... An artifact...! A legendary magical
relic created in ancient times..."

6.name: Sol
6.text:
"You can collect it as a part of your collection,
or you can use it in battle...! Amazing!!"

7.name: Sol
7.text:
"When you get one, your desire for more grows... I
want to collect a lot, a lot!!"

11.name: Erick
11.text:
"Calm down, Sol-chan. It's not scary, it's not
scary."

17.name: Sol
17.text: "Ooooo... the bitterness and hop aroma of this..."

18.name: Sol
18.text:
"Ooooh... the rich barrel aroma and the mellow
flavor..."

19.name: Sol
19.text:
"Ooooh... the matured aroma of grapes...
spaaark..."

20.name: Sol
20.text:
"Ohhh... the sweetness and aroma of honey are
unparalleled..."

22.name: Sol
22.text:
"I'm going to eat gold coins! Such a luxurious
snack..."

23.name: Sol
23.text:
"I'm going to eat pearls! (gulp gulp) Smooth and
sharp, delicious..."

24.name: Sol
24.text:
"I'm going to eat gold nuggets! Mmm... it feels
like the taste of home... nostalgic... It feels
like the taste of gold nuggets, doesn't it..."

25.name: Sol
25.text:
"This is... an emerald! Let's see... Ohhh... it
has a surprising sourness... Refreshing flavor..."

26.name: Sol
26.text:
"Ohhh... a large ruby... a dandy taste beyond the
cloudy glass..."

27.name: Sol
27.text:
"Ooooh... a diamond... sparkling... mmm... yes...
yes... A deep, masterful flavor..."

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Grilled whole bird!! Here I go!! Delicious...
delicious..."

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Black bread! Here I go!! Munch... munch...
delicious!!"

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"Berry pie! The recommended item in this village!
It's sweet and sour, very delicious, isn't it?!"

32.name: Sol
32.text:
"Onion stew! The depth of flavor is three-
dimensional!!"

33.name: Sol
33.text: "Venison! It's a favorite! Here I go, Mr. Deer!!"

34.name: Erick
34.text:
"I wonder if this child understands what she's
saying..."
